l:dependency.name: OkHttp
l:dependency.l:description: An HTTP+SPDY client for Android and Java applications

l:dependency.name: signpost-core
l:dependency.l:description: A simple, light-weight, and modular OAuth client library for the Java platform.

l:dependency.name: Jackson-annotations
l:dependency.l:description: Core annotations used for value types, used by Jackson data binding package.

l:dependency.name: Google HTTP Client Library for Java
l:dependency.l:description: Google HTTP Client Library for Java. Functionality that works on all supported Java platforms, including Java 5 (or higher) desktop (SE) and web (EE), Android, and Google App Engine.

l:dependency.name: Converter: Jackson
l:dependency.l:description: Type-safe HTTP client for Android and Java by Square, Inc.

l:dependency.name: Jackson-datatype-Joda
l:dependency.l:description: Add-on module for Jackson (http://jackson.codehaus.org) to support Joda (http://joda-time.sourceforge.net/) data types.

l:dependency.name: jackson-databind
l:dependency.l:description: General data-binding functionality for Jackson: works on core streaming API

l:dependency.name: Okio
l:dependency.l:description: A modern I/O API for Java

l:dependency.name: Codec
l:dependency.l:description: The codec package contains simple encoder and decoders for various formats such as Base64 and Hexadecimal. In addition to these widely used encoders and decoders, the codec package also maintains a collection of phonetic encoding utilities.

l:dependency.name: Apache Groovy
l:dependency.l:description: Groovy: A powerful, dynamic language for the JVM

l:dependency.name: Retrofit
l:dependency.l:description: Type-safe HTTP client for Android and Java by Square, Inc.

l:dependency.name: Google OAuth Client Library for Java
l:dependency.l:description: Google OAuth Client Library for Java. Functionality that works on all supported Java platforms, including Java 5 (or higher) desktop (SE) and web (EE), Android, and Google App Engine.

l:dependency.name: Jackson-core
l:dependency.l:description: Core Jackson abstractions, basic JSON streaming API implementation

l:dependency.name: Joda time
l:dependency.l:description: Date and time library to replace JDK date handling

l:dependency.name: Guava: Google Core Libraries for Java
l:dependency.l:description:
Guava is a suite of core and expanded libraries that include utility classes, google's collections, io classes, and much much more.
Guava has only one code dependency - javax.annotation, per the JSR-305 spec.

l:dependency.name: Adapter: RxJava
l:dependency.l:description: Type-safe HTTP client for Android and Java by Square, Inc.
